channel.title: Evan Hill on Refresh Annapolis Valley
channel.description: Recent content in Evan Hill on Refresh Annapolis Valley

item.title: Refreshing Marketing
item.description: Marketing is forever changing. What works one week does not necessarily work the next. Join Duncan Ebata , Evan Hill , and Ashley Greene for a marketing insiders discussion on how to stay on the curve. They will explore why and how empathizing and understanding customers can be game changing; how to “growth hack” your marketing to double your results at half the cost; and time saving and low cost tools for marketing.
